title: Strengthening Practical Programming Competencies: Designing a PLE&N-Based Collaborative Lifelong Learning Model for Language Domains

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language learning experience and proficiency in fundamental digital device usage
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can self-directively set three or more work-integrated language learning goals using PLE&N tools.
Learners can improve learning outcomes by over 20% by integrating external institutional resources (e.g., video conferencing systems, expert networks, MOOC materials).
Learners can complete collaborative project deliverables within deadlines through peer assessment and feedback systems.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
